description:
No edits, no cuts, no breaks, all action recorded; you see what really happens. Hogtied is the only place you can see this type of shoot. 1 hour of reality BDSM without one edit!
Few models can endure this real-time live shoot. It takes a special toughness, great determination, and above all, a genuine love of bondage. We thank Madison for enduring and looking so damn beautiful doing it! We are not going to bore you with a 1000 word description of the shoot in solid block form. Instead, check out the preview; we will let our imagery speak for us. Join Hogtied today, and find out why it is the largest, best, most visited bondage site on the net today.
title: Madison Young stars in one of Hogtied's real time live shoots.
